title: The Case Against Adnan Syed – Addendum 4 – Loose Ends
description:
April 4, 2019 / Rabia hosts this week's addendum wrapping up the HBO docuseries #TheCaseAgainstAdnanSyed by discussing episode 4 and answering listener questions with Colin, Susan and guest panelist, Justin Brown.

Episode scoring music by Patrick Cortes and Spencer Burdette.

This episode was sponsored by Honeybook.

www.Honeybook.com promo code UNDISCLOSED

#undisclosed #freeadnan #justiceforhae #thecaseagainstadnansyed
